original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, badges as b WHERE c.UserId = b.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-11 14:33:06' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 14:33:06'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.UserId)
